name: Login Portal
tagline: JSP Servlet implementation with Twitter Bootstrap
body:
### Welcome to LoginPortal !

'LoginPortal' is implementation of login procedure in company with proper database integration.
For demonastration purpose I created it.

### What It will do :-

This portal will ask the user to input his/her "username" and "password" it will check the existence of this
user in the database if exists, retrieve his/her name and location from the databse and display them.If not registered, Display invalid user.

### Tools Used :-

1. JSP Servlet for backend
1. twitter bootstrap for frontend decoration
1. mysql as database
1. eclipse IDE for development

### Features :-

1. user authentication from database table
1. dashboard can be used for further enhancement


### How to use :-

1. open configuration file (DB.properties) of database present @ LoginPortal / WebContent / config / 
1. update DB.properties with your database username,password and hostname
1. open file (ConnectionHandler.java ) present @ LoginPortal / src / com / digitalgradient / portal / db /
1. change at line no 19 , [ ConfigProperties.initialize("<file path >");] with path of ur dB configuration file you can give realtive path if project is kept in serrver itself else need to give absolute path
1. create a table in your database ,name it users and create the columns: 'username', 'password', 'name',and 'location';
1. compile the project, now you are ready to deploy WebContent folder on server
